T.query: select p.productid,pv.businessentityid, piv.locationid, pm.productmodelid, u.unitmeasurecode from product p left join productvendor pv on p.productid = pv.productid left join vendor v on pv.businessentityid = v.BusinessEntityID join productmodel pm on pm.productmodelid = p.productmodelid left join unitmeasure u on u.unitmeasurecode = p.sizeunitmeasurecode join productinventory piv on p.productid = piv.productid

F.query: select p.productid,pv.businessentityid, piv.locationid, pm.productmodelid, u.unitmeasurecode from product p left join productvendor pv on p.productid = pv.productid left join vendor v on pv.businessentityid = v.BusinessEntityID join productmodel pm on pm.productmodelid = p.productmodelid join unitmeasure u on u.unitmeasurecode = p.sizeunitmeasurecode join productinventory piv on p.productid = piv.productid

select p.productid,pv.businessentityid, piv.locationid, pm.productmodelid, u.unitmeasurecode from product p left join productvendor pv on p.productid = pv.productid left join vendor v on pv.businessentityid = v.BusinessEntityID join productmodel pm on pm.productmodelid = p.productmodelid and pm.productmodelid = p.productid left join unitmeasure u on u.unitmeasurecode = p.sizeunitmeasurecode join productinventory piv on p.productid = piv.productid
